title: Interpreting a signaling pathway Set member 3

content.question: Which of the following claims is most consistent with the data shown in Figure 2 ?

choices.label: <math alttext="E s p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>E</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> expression is necessary to prevent the overproduction of insulin.
<math alttext="E s p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Esp</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> protein does not regulate blood-sugar levels in normal mice.
Normal mice require a higher blood concentration of insulin than mutant mice do.
Mutant mice have a cyclical pattern of insulin secretion.

content.answer: <math alttext="E s p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>E</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> expression is necessary to prevent the overproduction of insulin.
